channel.title: 金融时报

item.title: 早上好，纽约。当你在睡觉时，这是我们阅读量最高的文章

item.title: 共同基金管理着近 200 亿美元的美国资产和约 630 亿美元的全球资产。但如今，共同基金的主导地位正受到新对手的威胁，这些新对手承诺提供税收优惠、低费用和快速交易
item.description:
Mutual funds manage nearly $20tn in US assets and about $63tn worldwide. But today, the mutual fund’s dominance is under threat from newer rivals that promise tax advantages, lower fees and rapid trading https://t.co/maIlebTVVE pic.twitter.com/V3BQzZSla6

— Financial Times (@FT) March 21, 2024

item.title: 欧盟民主事务负责人 @VeraJourova 警告说，欧洲大选将受到 "大量虚假信息 "的冲击，其中包括深度伪造、人工智能和 "隐蔽的操纵和外国干涉，尤其是来自克里姆林宫方面的干涉"@ft w @labboudles & @paulaerizanu
item.description:
EU democracy chief @VeraJourova warned the European elections will be hit by an “avalanche of disinformation” including deepfakes, AI & “hidden manipulation & foreign interference, especially from the side of the Kremlin”https://t.co/GU9qJR9srW @ft w @labboudles & @paulaerizanu

— Henry Foy (@HenryJFoy) March 21, 2024

item.title: 对拜登来说，美联储的货币宽松计划是最好的消息--没有之一：别提通货膨胀了，是高利率压抑了美国消费者。
item.description:
The Fed's monetary easing plans is the best news - bar none - for Biden: Forget inflation, it's high interest rates that is depressing American consumers. https://t.co/cvEm1lvNhR

— Edward Luce (@EdwardGLuce) March 20, 2024

item.title: 她认为与埃里森的交易更有意义。她认为与埃里森的交易更有意义。作为埃里森交易的一部分，杰夫-谢尔和杰夫-扎克可能会经营哥伦比亚广播公司和派拉蒙的有线电视频道。
item.description:
Shari is unconvinced by Apollo's $11bn offer for Paramount's studio. She thinks a deal with Ellison makes more sense.
as part of the Ellison deal, Jeff Shell & Jeff Zucker would likely run CBS & Paramount's cable channels
scoop w/@JFK_America @grimes_ce https://t.co/B6o7roe6rB

— Anna Nicolaou (@annaknicolaou) March 21, 2024

item.title: 世界将同时应对一些国家的 "婴儿潮 "和另一些国家的 "婴儿潮"。
item.description:
‘The world will be simultaneously tackling a "baby boom" in some countries and a "baby bust" in others.’

Here's why falling fertility rates in most countries over the next quarter century will have a far-reaching social and economic impact https://t.co/3wkgRcebXI pic.twitter.com/6xgmodULPL

— Financial Times (@FT) March 21, 2024

item.title: 哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统的官员们已经开始大规模削减数十家国有集团的成本，作为平衡阿根廷预算努力的一部分。这引发了与员工和工会的激烈冲突。
item.description:
President Javier Milei’s officials have begun large-scale cost cuts at dozens of state-owned groups as part of their effort to balance Argentina’s budget.

It is opening up fierce conflicts with staff and unions.https://t.co/gqnwo1gLEv pic.twitter.com/TWy3dEMFnE

— Financial Times (@FT) March 21, 2024

item.title: 格林尼治标准时间今天下午 2 点，我将在 Reddit 上做一个 AMA。 请在这里向我提出您有关经济学的问题：
item.description:
I'll be doing an AMA on Reddit at 2pm GMT today. Send me your questions on economics here: https://t.co/DEdSbkeN00

— Martin Wolf (@martinwolf_) March 21, 2024

item.title: - 与 @LOS_Fisher 一起前往格里姆斯比，在选举前报道红墙--对斯塔默或苏纳克的热情不高，但预计工党将夺取该席位，因为 2019 年 12 月背后的三大因素已经解除（约翰逊、科尔宾、英国脱欧推迟）。
item.description:
- went to Grimsby to report on Red Wall ahead of election

- little enthusiasm for Starmer or Sunak but expectation Labour will seize the seat

because the big 3 factors behind December 2019 have unwound (Johnson, Corbyn, Brexit delay)

with @LOS_Fisher https://t.co/BeS98lvy5d

— Jim Pickard 🐋 (@PickardJE) March 20, 2024

item.title: 新消息：伦敦罕见的科技成功案例之一--微软支持的初创企业在印度刑事调查中被点名--背后的人来自我和 @b_parkyn

item.title: 未来四分之一世纪生育率的下降将产生深远的社会影响。全球人口结构的变化对全球经济意味着什么？
